did.unittitle: International Commission on Zoological Nomenclature papers, 1955-1961
did.abstract: This material pertains to the revision of zoological nomenclature, 1958-1961, including correspondence, memoranda, etc., of the Editorial Committee. There is a copy of the RÃ¨gles (1901-1905) and the Bradley draft of 1955, as well as a Colloquium draft of July 1958. There are annotated copies of the Bulletin of Zoological Nomenclature, volume 14, pages 1-634. There are subsequent working drafts, galley of the draft and copy of the Code as published, 6 November 1961.

custodhist.head: Custodial History note
custodhist.p: This collection was kept by Norman Rudolph Stoll, who was the Chairman of the Editorial Committee of the Commission.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Presented by Norman Stoll and accessioned, 08/--/1966 (1966 1585-1591ms).
